content.text: Philip, is a fictional character in the television series The Office. Some sources incorrectly claim he was played by Philip Pickard, but Pickard was in fact an actor on the British version of The Office. The actor who played Philip is not known.
Philip works in the warehouse. He is present at the basketball game and is seen working in The Alliance.
He is present on the day that Michael holds a seminar in the warehouse for all the male staff members and at Casino Night.

After Michael holds a funeral for a dead bird, Dwight tells Philip and Lester to clean up the burned ashes. He is also at Bob Vance's bachelor party. He also attends the inventory party in Back From Vacation and the safety training seminars in Safety Training.
